Notes.Text:
This update for gimp fixes the following issue:

- CVE-2017-17789: Fix heap buffer overflow in PSP importer (bsc#1073627).

Vulnerabilities.Description: In GIMP 2.8.22, there is a heap-based buffer overflow in read_channel_data in plug-ins/common/file-psp.c.
